JobDescription:
Eligibility

•  Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering degree in Computer Science or Information Science
•  CGPA of 8.0 (out of 10) and above
•  Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Must be fluent in English.

What you will do ?

• Performs IT functions such as design, analysis, evaluation, testing, debugging, implementation/integration and operations of new tools, systems or 3rd party products/platforms to deliver or provide updates to business processes and operations on Enterprise Security related products and capabilities.

• Specify, build, maintain and support Enterprise Security products/capabilities. Analyzes, installs, acquires, modifies, and supports operating systems, platforms, directory services, authentication services and software services.

• Focused on configuring, installing, upgrading, monitoring, and scripting of existing Enterprise Security platforms/capabilities and applications (3rd party, home-grown, on-prem, cloud, etc.) to get the desired performance required.

Stakeholders

• Strong problem-solving instincts and abilities

• Attentive to detail

• Proficient in general security concepts like Cyber Security, Directory Services, 
  Authentication Services, Security Intelligence, Forensics etc..

• Familiar with general networking capabilities like IP Address Management, Routing, 
  Switching, Gateways, DNS, Load Balancing, Firewalls, etc..

• Familiar with standard programming languages (Linux, C,C++, Python), scripting and

Experience: Currently in the pre final year of MBA
JobDescription:
ROLE DESCRIPTION:


We are looking for a dynamic, energetic intern to join our Partner Enablement team. As our ideal candidate you should be eager to learn about MuleSoft and contribute to our channel ecosystem growth. You will be working closely with our team to help with operational tasks, orchestration of events, and receive hands on exposure to business planning, channel practice plans and management, and presenting to global audiences.

You will be involved in upcoming projects as well as assisting with current campaigns. The key to success is working in perfect concert with your team and responsibilities

YOUR IMPACT (RESPONSIBILITIES):

Perform operations tasks, such as data capture and reporting
Perform data analysis
Assist with orchestration of events (e.g. presentations, workshops)
Assist with Partner on-boarding
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:
MBA 2022 graduation
Currently in the pre final year of MBA
Desire to learn
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Ability to present analysis and findings to large groups of users
Proficiency in Google Suite and Microsoft Office
Proficiency with Excel or Google sheet logic, pivot tables & formulas 
Ability to multitask
Skills and Behaviours You’ll Need to be Successful: 
Action oriented
Collaborates
Global Perspective
Results Driven
Tech Savvy
Resourcefulness
Author: aniketdgp

JobDescription:

Author: aniketdgp

JobDescription:
Required Qualifications for Genesys Recruitment 2021:

Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science / Electric Engineering / related Engineering Degree or Self-starter who wants to write world-class code and be part of a world-class team with Freshers/ 1+ years of experience in software engineering.
A developer with excellent programming skills and interested in working on tech stack that primarily uses Python, Java, and web frameworks.
Comfortable developing and deploying in Linux (Ubuntu), cloud-hosting (AWS/Azure) and Docker.
Research or Industry experience in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning (ML) models, ML infrastructure, Natural Language Processing or Deep Learning.
Optional Skills:

Familiarity with modern web application/microservices framework like spring boot, flask.
Familiarity with AWS services e.g., EC2, S3, RDS, Load balancer, Cloud formation, VPC, R53, etc but not restricted to AWS, Azure would also be nice
Keen to learn new algorithms, new application areas, and new tools.
Exposure to development of AI/ML as a SaaS in the cloud and managing infrastructure.
Interested in tinkering with AI and ML frameworks like TensorFlow, and PyTorch.
Experience in building, deploying, and improving Machine Learning models and algorithms in real-world products.
About Role:

Genesys is seeking a passionate and talented Full-Stack Engineer to join our rapidly expanding artificial intelligence group based in Hyderabad.
You will be joining a collaborative team of like-minded people who thrive on technical problem solving and relish design challenges.
As a Full-Stack Engineer, you will highly build performant applications using such technologies as Java, Python, and Angular 2+ interacting with our REST APIs.
Solid understanding of HTML and CSS and experience with other dev stacks, such as Node.js and Express is a plus.
About Conversational AI Team:

This is an exciting time to be part of Applied Research group as we are innovating with speed and scale. You will be a key contributor to create the best cloud-based customer experience (CX) solution focusing on AI and providing an amazing end-to-end experience.
As a part of Conversational AI team, you will help us builds Genesys core AI capabilities including Speech Understanding, Natural Language Understanding, and processing, chatbots, voicebots, knowledge surfacing etc., to power the next generation of Genesys products.
Key Responsibilities:

Implement and enhance web-services
Contribute to UI components and their integration into existing webservices.
Prototype webservice calls to mock api’s.
Bring features all the way through the Design, Beta, Generally Available, Maintain cycle.
Author: aniketdgp

JobDescription:
Job Description of Wipro Careers Freshers Internship 2021:
•  The Trainee is responsible for configuring and testing Wipro’s proprietary Total Benefit Administration™ System to meet the needs of our clients’ requirements.
•  Configuring involves using proprietary systems and tools to set up and configure tables/parameters in the TBA System as defined by analysis.
•  Testing involves the preparation of test cases and test data and execution of test activities based on the direction from the SA.
•  This role is designed as an entry-level position for applicants with strong skill sets in programming (logical reasoning, analytical skills),systems configuration and testing related to systems that support human resource functions.
Author: aniketdgp

JobDescription:
Responsible for the maintain, manage and update data within SAP System for all DTTL’s business. 
Work closely with stakeholders to capture data, look at current and historical data and identify gaps/recommendations for improving the data.
Evaluate and validate multiple reports from the online and offline data sources to conduct data analyses
Ability to learn new technology and enhancement within the existing system to bring in process improvements
Work with the team for development and rollout of automated solutions within Data Management, which will include working closely with the Technology team.
Maintain data dictionary, terminology and other documentation associated with Data Management
Be back up to team members, offer recommendations and opinions on what can be improved and implemented to achieve the efficiency within Data Management
Having full knowledge and expertise about the complete lifecycle of HR is critical in this role.
